SELECT r.id, r.name, r.charge_id, cr.charging_rule, r.china_id, c.name, r.inspector_id, i.name, r.parking_limit, r.create_time FROM road r LEFT JOIN charge cr ON r.charge_id = cr.id LEFT JOIN inspector i ON r.inspector_id = i.id LEFT JOIN china c ON r.china_id = c.id
AND r.name LIKE CONCAT('%'#{name}'%')
AND cr.charging_rule LIKE CONCAT('%'#{chargingRule}'%')
AND i.inspector_name LIKE CONCAT('%'#{inspectorName}'%')
